# VirtualScroller.getIndex() method

Get nearest item index for pixel offset;

**Signature:**

```typescript
getIndex(offset: number): number;
```

</th><th>

</th><th>

</th></tr></thead>

</td><td>

</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns**

number

Nearest item index

## Remarks

[itemCount](/virtual/reference/virtual-core.virtualscrollerruntimeparams.itemcount) must be &gt; 0. Possible item index range: 0 &lt;<!-- -->= N &lt; [itemCount](/virtual/reference/virtual-core.virtualscrollerruntimeparams.itemcount)<!-- -->. Time complexity: `O(log2(itemCount))`
